INTRO_TEXT: Hello, I am a Front-End Developer based in Ettenheim, Germany. I have successfully completed several projects. I've had the privilege of working alongside top-tier programmers, which has greatly accelerated my personal and professional development. If you are interested in hiring me, please feelfree to contact me.
FACT_1: Away from the screen, I find my greatest joy in spending time with my family. Whether it's exploring nature together or simply enjoying a cozy evening at home, these moments are sacred to me.
FACT_2: Furthermore, I am interested in continuously expanding my horizons and plan to extend my skills to a full-stack development in my free time.
I've acquired expertise in developing pr: I've acquired expertise in developing projects utilizing diverse frontend technologies and concepts.
This page is a sample of my work - pleas: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
JOIN_DESC: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
POLLOLOCO_DESC: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
ROF_DESC: Firebase hosted cardgame with rule-assigned actions.
POKEMON_DESC: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.
